metadata.synopsis: AD's for Jaheira commenting on little bits the player does in her house. Namely:- Approaches her study- Opens the secret door to her secret room- Enters said secret room- Finds Khalid's amulet
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Enter Jaheira's house- Go into the main room, these should play Bookmark for the house: larian://bookmark?name=CTY_JaheirasHouse&mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=-198.180267;36.128036;-47.551403&camTarget=-198.939575;35.720970;-47.043709

2.speaker: Jaheira
2.text: A gift from my husband. I've had to renew parts, over the years - but the heart remains the same as the day he gave it to me.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: May or may not be going a bit hardcore into Odysseus's ship as a throwaway line here, but oh well.NodeContext: This is in reference to her husband Khalid, who died violently over a century previously. It came close to breaking her at the time, but now there is only fondness for the man she remembers. The gift is a spider-silk amulet with a gem at its centre, made with Khalid's own hands.

3.speaker: Jaheira
3.text: The only patch of wilderness this city permits me. There ought to be supplies here to aid us.

9.speaker: Minsc
9.text: You know this place, Boo? Hmph - Minsc has never been invited.

4.text: This Harper pin opens more doors than most. Come down to my study and see if you can figure it out.

5.text: Hah! I wondered if it would take you long to spot.

8.speaker: Jaheira
8.text: Pay no mind to the those. You're probably safe so long as I am here.
8.context: InternalNodeContext: We can change this up if it doesn't work - But the Glyphs are cast like spells so players will, in theory, be immune to the effects of them as long as Jaheira is with them.

7.speaker: Jaheira
7.text: But if you do not trust me - take the weight from the pressure plate there.
7.context: InternalNodeContext: It's a pressure plate being held down by a box - Lifting it from it will stop the traps.
